keyMoments.title: Doran Reveals Giant Cannon with Sayo as Hostage
keyMoments.description: Doran unveils a massive cannon with Sayo tied up on the roof within its firing range, demonstrating the cannon's devastating firepower to intimidate the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the tension and establishes Doran as a credible threat.

keyMoments.title: Doran Demands the Research Notebook
keyMoments.description: Doran threatens to execute Sayo unless Lina hands over her father's research notebook.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the central conflict for the episode's climax.

keyMoments.title: Doran's Defeat
keyMoments.description: Doran is defeated by Luffy's Gigant Axe attack as Spa Island is destroyed.
keyMoments.significance: Concludes Doran's role as the arc's villain.

relationships.description: Doran collaborated with Foxy to steal the rainbow gem secret from Sayo and Lina.

evolutionMoments.description: Their collaboration is revealed as they worked together to obtain the gem-making method.

reveals.information: Doran cares about money more than anything else and will serve anyone if they can pay, including pirates.
Doran was working with Foxy to obtain the secret of the rainbow gem.

keyMoments.title: Sayo Reveals Father's True Intentions
keyMoments.description: Sayo tells Lina that their father truly cared for them and left to protect them from his pursuers, not because he abandoned them.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional depth and gives Lina motivation to complete their father's work.
keyMoments.quote: Father didn't abandon us. He left to protect us!

keyMoments.title: Sayo Rescued from the Cannon
keyMoments.description: Zoro cuts through the giant cannon with Dai Tetsugiri, freeing Sayo from her restraints.

keyMoments.title: Completes the Rainbow Gem
keyMoments.description: Sayo and Lina successfully complete the rainbow gem using the volcanic steam and send it to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Fulfills her father's research and provides closure to the arc.

relationships.description: Sayo is Lina's older sister and has cared for her since their mother's death.

evolutionMoments.description: Sayo reveals the truth about their father to Lina, strengthening their bond.

reveals.information: Sayo's father left to protect his daughters from pursuers, not because he abandoned them.
Sayo is extremely smart and can understand all of her father's complex formulas.

keyMoments.title: Lina Pleads for Help Finding Sayo
keyMoments.description: Lina reveals she has searched everywhere on the ship and cannot find Sayo, pleading with Luffy to help, which leads to his decision to destroy Spa Island.
keyMoments.significance: Sets the episode's main conflict in motion.

keyMoments.title: Lina Learns Truth About Her Father
keyMoments.description: Lina discovers that her father didn't abandon them but left to protect them from danger.
keyMoments.significance: Character development moment where Lina's perspective on her father changes.

keyMoments.title: Completes the Rainbow Gem
keyMoments.description: Lina works with Sayo to successfully complete the rainbow gem using the volcanic steam.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Lina accepting and completing her father's legacy.

relationships.description: Lina is Sayo's younger sister who travels with her to complete their father's research.

evolutionMoments.description: Lina learns the truth about their father from Sayo and commits to completing his research.

reveals.information: Lina initially believed her father abandoned them, but learns he left to protect them.
Lina gains faith in her father's research and commits to completing the rainbow gem.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Decides to Destroy Spa Island
keyMoments.description: Luffy makes the bold decision to wreck Spa Island to find Sayo after Lina's desperate plea.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's willingness to take extreme action to help others.

keyMoments.title: Gear Third: Gigant Axe Attack
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Third and delivers a devastating Gigant Axe attack that destroys the cannon and splits Spa Island in two.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's Gear Third power in the filler arc.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Loses the Rainbow Gem
keyMoments.description: Luffy accidentally loses the rainbow gem that Sayo and Lina sent to the crew.

abilities.description: Luffy activates Gear Third, inflates his leg to giant size, and brings it down on his target with devastating force.

keyMoments.title: Dai Tetsugiri (Great Buddha Slayer)
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses a new anime-original Three Sword Style technique to slice through Doran's giant cannon and free Sayo.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this anime-only technique, demonstrating Zoro's ability to cut through massive objects.

abilities.description: Zoro leaps backward and performs four parallel vertical cuts below him with his three-sword style, capable of cutting through massive objects like cannons. Anime-only technique.

keyMoments.title: Robin Uses Seis Fleur
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Seis Fleur technique to restrain Doran during the rescue operation.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's tactical use of her Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Special Tobasco Star Attack
keyMoments.description: Usopp shoots a Special Tobasco Star into Doran's mouth, heating it up and incapacitating him.

abilities.description: Usopp shoots a star filled with hot tobasco sauce that heats up the target's mouth when hit.
